metrics.name: PublishSize
metrics.documentation: Metric for the size of messages published through this topic

metrics.name: NumberOfMessagesPublished
metrics.documentation: The number of messages published to your Amazon SNS topics.

metrics.name: NumberOfNotificationsDelivered
metrics.documentation: The number of messages successfully delivered from your Amazon SNS topics to subscribing endpoints.

metrics.name: NumberOfNotificationsFailed
metrics.documentation: The number of messages that Amazon SNS failed to deliver.

metrics.name: NumberOfNotificationsFilteredOut
metrics.documentation: The number of messages that were rejected by subscription filter policies.

metrics.name: NumberOfNotificationsFilteredOut-NoMessageAttributes
metrics.documentation: The number of messages that were rejected by subscription filter policies because the messages have no attributes.

metrics.name: NumberOfNotificationsFilteredOut-InvalidAttributes
metrics.documentation: The number of messages that were rejected by subscription filter policies because the messages' attributes are invalid

metrics.name: SMSMonthToDateSpentUSD
metrics.documentation: The charges you have accrued since the start of the current calendar month for sending SMS messages.

metrics.name: SMSSuccessRate
metrics.documentation: The rate of successful SMS message deliveries.
